document_data.mainbody:
Mistress Ada was a ranking red-headed priestess in service of the Church of Talos of Athkatlas Temple District in the late 14 century DR.
Ada wore a set of splint mail and carried a hefty club. A heavy necklace of Talos hung from her chest, displaying her affiliation with the Stormlords church.
By the , Mistress Ada could be found in the great Temple of Talos, guarded by Storm Knights while performing daily tasks of a ranking priestess, providing services to visitors, and exchanging enchanted items, protection scrolls, and potions for donations to the temple. The same year, Ada was targeted by MaeVar, one of the Shadow Thieves of Athkatla. MaeVar sought to steal the necklace of Talos.
